thought: To craft a quartz_pillar, I first need to craft a quartz_block. The quartz_block is crafted by placing a quartz in the middle of the crafting grid. The middle of the crafting grid is slot 5. I will move the quartz from slot 43 to slot 1 to make it easier to craft the quartz_block.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1
